title: Wayne Rooney clambers on inflatable with his sons as ill Coleen mopes at home
text:

Wayne Rooney has jetted off to Barbados leaving his wife Coleen at home.

The sports star whisked Kai, nine, Klay, six, and Kit, three, away with him while he celebrated turning 34 in the Caribbean.

In the sun, the footballer and his sons clambered onto a green inflatable for an afternoon of fun as they tore up the water.

Coleen and their youngest son Cass were nowhere to be seen as they were forced to miss out on the adventurous break after she fell sick with an infection.

It's been a tough few weeks for Coleen after she waged war on her former friend Rebekah Vardy.

The WAG accused a person with access to Becky's Instagram account of leaking stories about her which has sparked a war with Rebekah.

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

Keen to put the drama behind him, Wayne escaped the country with three of their sons leaving Coleen to fend for herself at home.

Coleen's parents Colette and Anthony McLoughlin still made the trip to give the dad-of-four a hand with keeping the kids amused on the beach break.

Wayne looked happy when he was surrounded by his children as they enjoyed their afternoon on the water.

Back at home in the UK, Coleen was left in charge of looking after their youngest 20-month-old son Cass.

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

However, she was quick to wish her husband a happy birthday on social media.

She wrote: "Happy a brilliant day with our boys! All our love always."

He responded: "Thanks for the birthday wishes."

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

(Image: ChrisBrandis.com / BACKGRID)

Coleen set out she didn't make the family trip to Barbados in half term because she contracted an infection.

The mother-of-four fell ill just shortly before they were due to leave for their holiday.

But she had her youngest son Cass to keep her company while she remained at home.

She shared with her followers: "Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass. We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break.

"Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave. I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better."
description: Coleen Rooney was unable to make the family trip to Barbados because she's contracted an infection
